mobs.LongDesc: A villager does villager-type things here.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You see a normal every-day villager doing the daily things necessary to
survive.

mobs.LongDesc: The King sits here, looking at you with a royal calm.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
The King sits on his throne with worry creasing his handsome face.  He
looks hopefully at you and, pushing up his glasses, says, "Please, if
you are willing to risk your life to rescue my son, I will gladly
compensate you for the danger, as well as give you the hand of my
daughter, the princess Chelsea."

mobs.LongDesc: The Queen sits here, smiling happily.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You see the smiling visage of the town's queen.  Her dark locks of hair and
ruby red lips remind you of a fairy tale character.  While she smiles amiably
at you, you can sense a deep sadness springing from her, no doubt caused
by the void left inside her when her son was kidnapped.

mobs.LongDesc: Princess Chelsea stands here, looking hopefully into your eyes.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
The princess is quite beautiful, and you are captivated by her dancing,
violet eyes, as well as her long, lavender hair.  She is dressed in a 
long white dress which suits her role as princess.  However, on her
neck, you see a holy symbol denoting her membership in the guild of
Sanctus.

mobs.LongDesc: You see a highwayman here, waiting for potential victims.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You see a typical highway robber, except his armor his a collection of
plates and leather that have been accumulated in his years of thievery.
Something tells you to move on before he spots you and threatens you at
swordpoint.

mobs.LongDesc: A squire stands here, attending his knight's needs.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You see a scrawny young boy who one day wishes to be a knight.  Within
his eyes you see the fires of potential, which will one day be realized.

mobs.LongDesc: A page stands here, waiting to be told what to do.
mobs.DetailedDesc: You see a page, eagerly awaiting orders.

mobs.LongDesc: A knight of the realm stands here, defending the kingdom.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You see a large, burly knight who is ready to defend his kingdom with his
life. You don't want to mess with this man, for fear of your own life.
He bows his head your way, and smiles amiably.

mobs.LongDesc: A royal guard stands here, protecting the realm.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
A really big and brawny man stands here, wearing armor and wielding a 
large halberd.  He will do anything to protect his kingdom and his liege,
so don't mess with him.

mobs.LongDesc: A member of the court stands here.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You see a member of the court standing here, looking aloof and snooty.
You have an urge to bash his face in.

mobs.LongDesc: The shoppekeepe sits here, waiting for your purchase.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
The owner looks very big and very seasoned.  From the stories you have
heard about him from the villagers, he used to be an adventurer before
settling down and starting up this store... but his days as an hero have
not been forgotten, as can be clearly seen from the items in the shop.
He sits behind the counter waiting for you to pay for your purchases.

mobs.LongDesc: A steelsmith stands here, taking pride in his workmanship.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
The smith looks like he has spent most of his life working steel.  He is
very large and intimidating, with a booming voice and a hearty laugh.
A generous man, who takes pride in his work, and whose prices are fair.

mobs.LongDesc: A sorceress stands here, scrutinizing you as you browse through her wares.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You see a middle aged sorceress who still has retained much of her beauty.
She smiles at you as you enter the store, and tells you to take your time
looking for the items that you may need.  She looks at you intently, 
obviously wary of thieves, and you would not want to mess with this lady,
for the townspeople have spoken of her power.

mobs.LongDesc: The armorer stands here, smiling proudly at her workmanship.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
The armorer stands here, looking pleased that her shop has been visited
by so many customers.  She looks toughened from the years of her working
steel, and seasoned from her years of adventuring, which have been the
gossip among the townsfolk.  Rumor has it that she is good friends with
the sorceress who runs the magic shop, and that they often collaborate
to create the most wondrous of armours... one of which she sells openly
at her shop, the famous assault armor.

mobs.LongDesc: The shopkeeper stands here, smiling amiably at you.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You see before you a friendly shopkeeper who is perpetually smiling at you.
But in her eyes you see the mark of a fair, yet shrewd business woman.  She
looks seasoned and from the gossip you hear among the townsfolk, she had
once led a successful career as a thief.

mobs.LongDesc: A holy priest stands here, waiting to tend to your needs.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You see a priest standing here, smiling warmly at you.  From the villagers,
you have discovered that each of the shop owners here once adventured together,
and have just recently retired from their adventuring to open shops at this 
town. The priest had also been one of them... he was the cleric within
the group.  Now he is just a regular priest, tending this church and selling
valuable holy items to various adventurers.  All the money will, of course,
go to charity.

mobs.LongDesc: A wild wolf stands here, snarling at you angrily.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You see before you a rather large, rather hungry-looking wolf.  It seems
to be waiting for you to make the first move...

mobs.LongDesc: A wild dog stands here, foaming at the mouth.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You see a wild dog here, foaming at the mouth and barking at you wildly.
You think you will keep your distance from this wild creature.

mobs.LongDesc: A wild eagle lies here wounded, with an arrow in its wing.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You see a poor, wild, eagle, who has had the misfortune of being shot
with an arrow.  You wonder if you should put it out of it's misery.

mobs.LongDesc: A wild boar snorts here, waiting to impale you on its horns.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You see a wild boar ahead of you.  You think it'd be a wise decision
to stay away from its path.

mobs.LongDesc: A thief lurks here, waiting for unsuspecting victims.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You see an unscrupulous character who is dressed like a bandit.  He is
wandering around, hiding and sneaking within shadows looking for victims
to rob.

mobs.LongDesc: A small, emerald imp is here, flapping it's tiny wings.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You see a tiny imp flapping its wings.  Its emerald color is a good
camouflage in this dark forest, and you wouldn't have seen it if it 
hadn't started flapping its wings.  You have heard stories about the
Demon Lord using imps as his messengers... maybe you shouldn't let 
this little devil get away.

mobs.LongDesc: Godzilla is on a rampage here in the city
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You hear the distant rumble of not so little feet in the distance. Looking
up you see the largest lizard you've ever seen staring down on you. Having
teeth like a Tyrannosaurus and the spine plates of a Stegosaurus, this thing
does NOT look like a monster you'd like to toy around with. Keeping your di
, you run for life as he lets out a stream of fiery breath.

mobs.LongDesc: The Siren stands here, singing her sweet song.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You see a beautiful woman standing on this small island, humming a slow
melody to herself.  As you look closer, you find yourself captivated by
her beautiful eyes, and as she starts singing, you find yourself closer
and closer to falling for the woman's charms...

mobs.LongDesc: A goblin stands here, looking at you with evil intent.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
It's a vicious looking goblin with sharp teeth and sharp claws.  You wonder
what it's thinking as it looks at you, drooling ichor onto the grass.

mobs.LongDesc: You see a hobgoblin here, grinning at you visciously.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You see a nasty looking creature which eyes you hungrily.  It slowly circles
around you as if sizing you up and looks like it could easily rip apart a
normal human being in a matter of seconds.

mobs.LongDesc: A disgusting orc stands here, looking at your weapon greedily.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
An orc stands before you, obviously wanting to kill you for your weapon.  
You wonder if you should put this creature in its place and be done with
it.

mobs.LongDesc: A stone gargoyle sits here, pondering an unknown question.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You see a large creature which is known as a gargoyle.  They are generally
quiet creatures that usually do not bother anyone.  They have even been used
as the embodiment of protection for castles.  You think you'd best leave 
this one alone.

mobs.LongDesc: A dark dwarf stands here, seeking his fortune.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You see a dwarf dressed in dark clothing.  You realize that this is not an
ordinary dwarf, who are generally polite and kind, though sometimes gruff.
This one only has greed in his eyes, and looks like he'd kill you just for
one gold piece.

mobs.LongDesc: A dark elf stands here, hiding in the shadows.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You see a dark elf who stands there, unseen in the shadows of the forest.
He looks at you with a menacing sneer on his face and looks pretty mean.
You wonder if you should move on before he does something drastic.

mobs.LongDesc: A giant earth beetle sleeps here.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You see a giant earth beetle that looks about the size of a large ox.  You
wonder if it is wise to disturb its slumber.

mobs.LongDesc: A fearsome lich looks at you with comtempt.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This creature of the undead does not appreciate you intrusion upon his
domain. His hollow sockets glow with pinpoints of eerie red light. 
Having seen untold horrors of many centuries of undead life, his half-
rotted skull contorts in a sneer, no longer knowing the light of the
living. As you look his way, he raises a skeletal finger in the air
calling down the power of the princes of Satan upon you.

mobs.LongDesc: Igarashi stands around holding a bike chain in her hand.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Igarashi, like Kazuya, had somehow ended up wondering into Devil's Wood.
Not being very used to knights, monsters, and queens, she holds her
bike chain warily, preparing to strike anything that may strike her back.
She has long blue hair and honey eyes. She wears her school jacket and
a pair of blue jeans and a scarf. As you see her take a battle stance,
you see a hint of worry under that tough exterior of hers.

mobs.LongDesc: Kazuya is here with a cloud of misfortune over his head.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This poor, unfortunate boy had the ill luck to fall in love with a girl who
ended up marrying his gay brother. Here he stands around with a lost look
in his eyes, wondering how in the world he ended up in Devil's Wood (must
be his cosmic misfortune! ^_^ Here he is seen wearing his school uniform and
carrying around a brief case with yesterday's homework. His red hair is
tossled about by the wind. What capture you as you look at him are his 
fuull, red eyes. They gleam with a pureness and gentleness that only a boy
his age could have.

mobs.LongDesc: Mitsuru stands here, trying to hide from all the ghosts chasing him.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You see a handsome, young man standing here, breathing heavily.  His dusty
blonde hair and violet eyes draw you to him.  Noticing your curious look,
he smiles broadly at you, greeting you with a curt handshake, and introduces
himself as Ikeda Mitsuru, the sempai (upperclassman) of Ryoukurin Ryou 
dorm (Or as the locals like to call it, Greenwood).  He is an amiable
person and you don't think you'd like to mess with him.

mobs.LongDesc: Shinobu is sitting here, meditating upon some great secret.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You see a young man sitting on the ground here, deep in thought.  He senses
your questioning look and looks at you with a smile, introducing himself as
Tezuka Shinobu.  You find his face quite handsome, and his dark hair is
colored with a strange deep purple tint.  You nod to him and go merrily on
your way, not wanting to bother this young, thoughtful, yet somehow powerful
man with your troubles.

mobs.LongDesc: Shun is standing here, looking around with wide-eyed wonder.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You see what appears to be a young woman standing here, looking around in
awe. She notices your strange look and smiles at you amiably.  You are
pleasantly surprised at her honest beauty and her long, lavender locks 
capture your attention.  She introduces herself as Kisaragi Shun, and runs
off somewhere else.  You find yourself wondering about this wonderful
person, thinking something is peculiar with her...

mobs.LongDesc: Tochizawa stands here, directing his film.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You see a young man with dirty blonde hair and glasses.  He is standing
here, furiously directing his film, telling the cast members what they
should do and where everything should go.  You can feel the burning fires
of inspiration in this young man.  Looking at him, you wonder what kind
of strange land you have walked into.

mobs.LongDesc: Dr. Hasukawa is here, checking up on patients.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Kazuhiro is the older brother of Kazuya Hasukawa. Very intelligent-
looking upon first glance, his eyes seem to tell you that he knows 
something that you don't. Short brown hair frames his almost pale face.
He pushes his glasses up on his nose and looks your way with an
acknowledging look.

mobs.LongDesc: Sumire strolls here, on her way to visit her little brother, Kazuya.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You see a lovely woman with dark lavender hair and eyes.  Her smile seems
to brighten the day and her voice melts your heart.  She notices your 
staring gaze, and introduces herself as Hasukawa Sumire, although she
stumbles a bit as she says the word Hasukawa.  You gather from the ring on
her finger that she is a newlywed.  She blushes at your perceptiveness and
nods in the affirmative.  She tells you that her maiden name is Kitani,
but she was just married recently, and now, she is en route to visiting her
new brother-in-law, Kazuya.

mobs.LongDesc: Furusawa stands here, carrying his motorcycle around.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You see a handsome man, standing at an intimidating height, and build like
a brick.  He has brown hair which is slicked back, except for a single 
elusive lock which falls lightly on his forehead.  Seeing your curious
looks, he introduces himself as Furusawa, one of the sempai at the Ryokurin
Ryou dorm, otherwise known as Greenwood.

mobs.LongDesc: You see a young man here, looking furiously at a strange device.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You see a young man here, working at a strange looking device.  His wide
eyes are concentrated upon the light which eminates from the magical
device which he carries.  Noticing your questioning gaze, he looks up
from his device and says, "Hi, I'm Aoki Kunihisa, how do you do?"  He
explains that he is working on the computer graphics for the Devil's Wood
movie. You look at him dubiously and decide to avoid this obviously
insane person.

mobs.LongDesc: You see a young man here, looking furiously at a strange device.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You see a young man here, working at a strange looking device.  His wide
eyes are concentrated upon the light which eminates from the magical
device which he carries.  Noticing your gaze, he looks up at you and smiles,
saying, "Good day, I'm Sakaguchi Hideya, what can I do for you?"  He
explains that he is working on the special effects for the Devil's Wood
movie. You look at him dubiously and decide to avoid this obviously
insane person.

mobs.LongDesc: You see a young man here, strolling along happily.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You see a young man here, with short hair and effeminate features.  He
walks with an air of lightness and for some reason, you are a bit fearful
of walking near him.  He smiles at you and says, "Hi, I'm Watanabe
Yoshiki, pleased to meet you."  You nod in his direction and walk away.

mobs.LongDesc: You see a young man here, strolling along happily.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You see a young man here, with short hair and effeminate features.  He
walks with an air of lightness and for some reason, you are a bit fearful
of going to close to him.  He smiles at a distance and says, "Hi, I'm
Fujikake Tatsura, what's your name?"  You smile warily at him and state
your name politely, and excuse yourself to an imaginary previous
engagement.

mobs.LongDesc: You see a beautiful woman here, looking around furiously.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You see a beautiful woman here, looking around furiously for something.
She has dark hair, and eyes, and wears some light make-up.  Her dark
clothes pique your interest, and her perfume is somewhat oily.  As she
notices your gaze, she looks at you with hard eyes and says, "Where the
hell is Shinobu?!?!"  You look at her quizzically and one of her
bodyguards whispers to you, "That's Tezuka Nagisa, you'd better not mess
with her if you know what's good for you.

mobs.LongDesc: You see a tall, lanky man with dark glasses and a suit.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You see a tall, lanky man here, with slicked-back hair, a thin mustache,
and a pair of dark sunglasses.  He is wearing a very nice suit, and looks
at you with contempt.  you look carefully at him and notice his very
protective stance near the beautiful woman who also stands here.  As you
walk by them, you hear the woman say, "A, we need to do something about
my evil brother!"

mobs.LongDesc: You see a large, muscular man with dark glasses and a suit.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You see a large, burly man here, with slicked back hair, and very dark
sunglasses.  He is wearing a very nice suit, and looks at you with a sneer.
YOu look carefully at him and notice his very protective stance near the
beautiful woman who is also here.  As you walk by them, you hear the
woman say, "B! How could you let my brother's wimpy roommate beat you up!?"

mobs.LongDesc: You see a normal looking man here, with dark glasses and a suit.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You see a relatively normal looking, young man here.  He has dusty blonde
hair and dark glasses which hide his eyes.  He is wearing a very expensive
suit and you look at him with a questioning look.  He notices your look
and says to you, "It's not bad being a bodyguard, the pay is very good." 
You then notices his protective stance near the beautiful woman who is
also standing here, as you walk past them, you hear her say, "C!  How could
you go out and buy cake while I my evil brother came over and harrassed me?"

mobs.LongDesc: You see a short, chubby man here, with dark glasses and a suit.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You see a short, chubby young man with brown hair and dark glasses.  He
is wearing a very expensive suit and you wonder what he is doing.  He
gives you a curt smile, and you notice his defensive stance near the
beautiful woman who is also standing here.  As you pass them by, you hear
the woman say, "D!  You miserable excuse for a bodyguard, what do you
think you were doing when my brother was here?"

mobs.LongDesc: You see a giant cockroach crawling around here.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Ewww, it's a humungous cockroach!  You wonder if it's possible to kill this
thing given it's enormous size.

mobs.LongDesc: A giant rat looks for scraps of food here.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You see a giant rat here, rooting through the trash on the floor, looking
for something to eat.  You look at it with pity, and wonder if you should
put it out of its misery.

mobs.LongDesc: A cobra slithers nearby, looking for a victim.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You see a cobra slithering nearby, and think you should stay away from
its poisonous bite.

mobs.LongDesc: A boa constrictor slithers here, waiting to crush its victims.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You see a long snake, and its body is think and strong.  You'd think you'd
keep your distance from this snake...

mobs.LongDesc: A coyote is here, looking at you with an evil gleam in its eye.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You see a coyote lurking about, and its eyes gleam with an evil light,
looking at you as it drools hungrily.

mobs.LongDesc: A hyena stalks here, laughing at you.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You see a laughing hyena here.  Its grin strikes fear in your heart and
you think you'd better move out of here soon.

mobs.LongDesc: A cow stands here, grazing on the grass.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You see a large cow here, grazing on the grass, and minding its own 
business.  You think you'd better leave it be and let it go on with
its life.

mobs.LongDesc: You see a giant ant crawling along the ground here.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You see a giant ant here.  It crawls along the ground quickly and seems
to be looking for something to eat.  You think that you'd better keep
away from it.

mobs.LongDesc: A poor beggar wanders here, looking for something to eat.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You see a poor beggar here, looking for something to eat.  He looks at you
with a pleading look at sticks an open hand at you.

mobs.LongDesc: You see a giant ogre here, stomping around the forest.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You see a giant ogre here.  He looks mean and nasty, and smells as if he 
hasn't been washed in years.  You think you'd better stay clear of him if
you don't want to gag on your own vomit.

mobs.LongDesc: You see a large minotaur here, snorting angrily
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You see a large minotaur here, snorting at you.  He looks very big and you
don't think you can take him.  You wonder what he is doing in this part of
the woods....

mobs.LongDesc: You see a water elemental here, splashing around happily.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You see a small spirit floating around in the water happily.  She smiles
at you and splashes water at you playfully.  She winks at you and says,
Hi, I'm Udine, the water elemental, how do you do?

mobs.LongDesc: You see a fire elemental burn here, smiling at you with a sly grin.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You find yourself looking into the bright, red eyes of a fire elemental.
It smiles at you with a mischievous grin and winks.  He looks very strong,
and you doubt you could take him in a fair fight.  He dances around you
and says, "Heya!  I'm Ifrit!  How do you do?"

mobs.LongDesc: You see a wind elemental here, dancing happily in the fog.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You see a pretty, wind elememtal here, dancing in the thick fog which covers
this area.  She smiles at you happily and dances around you, patting you on
the head.  She says, "Hi, I'm Sylph.  Can I help you with anything?"

mobs.LongDesc: You see an earth elemental here, tending her plants.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You see a beautiful earth elemental here.  She is watering her plants as
you walk in and she smiles at you.  "I don't get many visitors here in 
this old castle.  Is there anything I can do for you?  I'm Gaia, the one
in charge of the flow of this sandfall."

mobs.LongDesc: You see a sun elemental here, basking in the warm sunlight.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You see a small creature which seems to be a sun elemental.  He is here
laying down on his back and enjoying a sunbath.  He notices your presence
and smiles at you, "Hi, I'm Lucid.  Would you care to join me in a nice
sunbath?  The weather's really nice today."  You smile in his direction
which gets you a warm smile in return.  The sun elemental sleepily shuts
his eyes and relaxes.

mobs.LongDesc: You see a moon elemental here, basking in the cool moonlight.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You see a small creature which seems to be a moon elemental.  She is here
laying down on her back and enjoying a moonbath.  She notices your presence
and smiles at you, "Hi, I'm Luna.  Would you care to join me in a nice 
moonbath?  The night's really nice today and I wouldn't mind some company."
You smile in her direction, which gets you a cool smile in return.  The
moon elemental shuts her eyes sleepily and is soon in a restful sleep.

mobs.LongDesc: A humungous blue dragon sits here, guarding her treasure.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You see a large dragon here, it has bluish scales and looks at you with
a suspicious look.  You guess it must be a pet of some sort, by the looks
of it, since it is chained to the wall and has a collar around it with the
words, "Gallowin of the water" on it.  Upon closer inspection you can see
a chest chained to it, and you wonder what could be inside it.

mobs.LongDesc: A humungous red dragon sits here, guarding her treasure.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You see a large dragon here, it has reddish scales and looks at you with
a suspicious look.  You guess it must be a pet of some sort, by the looks
of it, since it is chained to the wall and has a collar around it with the
words, "Bryst of the fire" on it.  Upon closer inspection, you can see a 
chest chained to it, and you wonder what could be inside it.

mobs.LongDesc: A humungous white dragon sits here, guarding his treasure.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You see a large dragon here, with white scales.  It looks at you suspiciously
as you wonder around the room.  You guess it must be a pet of some sort, since
it is chained to the wall, and has a collar around it, with the words, 
"Lanstar of the wind" written on it.  Upon closer inspection, you can see
a chest chained to it, and you wonder what could be inside it.

mobs.LongDesc: A humungous black dragon sits here, guarding her treasure.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You see a large dragon here, with black scales.  It looks at you suspiciously
as you wander about the room.  You guess it must be a pet of some sort, since
it is chained to the wall, and has a collar around it.  Looking closely, you
see the words, "Dinodilos of the rock" written upon the collar.  You see a
chest held against the dragon's breast, as you look on in awe.

mobs.LongDesc: A humungous grey dragon sits here, guarding his treasure.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You see a large dragon here, with grey scales.  It looks at you suspiciously
as you wander about the room.  You guess it must be a pet of some sort, since
it is chained to the wall, and has a collar around it.  Looking closely, you
see the words, "Burstone of the mountain" written upon the collar.  You see a
chest held against the dragon's breast, as you look on in awe.

mobs.LongDesc: A humungous silver dragon sits here, guarding his treasure.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You see a large dragon here, with silver scales.  It looks at you with
great suspicion as you wander about the room.  You guess it must be a pet
of some sort, judging from the chains which bind it to the wall.  Looking
closely, you see the words, "Rose c'est la vie of the moon" written upon its
collar.  You see a chest which the dragon hold close to it as well...

mobs.LongDesc: A humungous gold dragon sits here, guarding his treasure.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You see a large dragon here, with golden scales.  It looks at you suspiciously
as you wander about the room.  You guess it must be a pet of some sort, as
you can see a collar around it's neck, which reads, "Omzack of the thunder".
It holds a chest close to it.

mobs.LongDesc: A humungous white and blue dragons sits here, guarding its treasure.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You see a large dragon here, with white and blue scales.  It looks at you
suspiciously as you wander about.  You guess it must be a pet of some sort
since you see a collar around it which reads, "Zeorymer of the heavens".
You see it holding a chest close to it, protecting some sort of precious
treasure.

mobs.LongDesc: You see the demon lord standing before you, grinning evilly.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You see a tall man, with long, lavendar hair.  He gives you a malicious smile
and says, "So, you're the adventurers who have come on behalf of the King.
Well, since you have made it this far, I will tell you what I am doing.
Look around you.  These are the sands of time.  There is a spell that will
make me master of all time, and one of the components is a newborn child born
on the night of the full moon.  I won't allow anyone to stand in my way!"

mobs.LongDesc: A ghoul stands here, guarding its master.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You see an evil looking ghoul standing here.  It is obviously guarding its
master and it looks pretty tough.  You wonder what's the best way to deal
with the undead...

mobs.LongDesc: A spectre stands here, holding its scythe in an attack position.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You see an evil looking spectre standing here.  It is obviously guarding
its master and it looks pretty dangerous.  You wonder what's the best way
to deal with the undead creature...

mobs.LongDesc: A zombie stands here, guarding its master.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You see an evil looking zombie standing here. It is obviously guarding its
master and it looks pretty tough.  You wonder what's the best way to deal
with this undead creature.

mobs.LongDesc: You see a disgusting sandworm here, trying to lure you into its lair.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You see a huge sandworm here.  It tries to suck you into its lair with little
success.  You think you'd better run away from it as soon as possible, before
it gets smarter...

mobs.LongDesc: You see an adventurer here, wearing a half-cape and armor.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You see a handsome adventurer here.  He smiles at you with an honest smile,
and introduces himself, "Hi, I'm Lemon Herb, the homeless, are you going
on the quest to rescue the prince too?"  He looks like a formidable foe and
you don't think you'd like to mess with him.

mobs.LongDesc: You see a red-haired young man here.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You see a young man here, looking depressed.  He has red hair and bright
eyes.  You look at him carefully, measuring his character.  He looks up 
and says, "Hi, I'm Tino, Herb's retainer.  We're on a mission to rescue the
prince of this realm."  You nod your head and wonder if you should join
this quest as well.

mobs.LongDesc: A boatsman stands here, waiting for customers.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You see a big, burly bear of a man who sits here, with an oar in hand.
He nods in your direction and asks, "If you would like to pay for fare
across the lake, you're out of luck.  There's a Siren who is there who
captures anyone who would cross the lake... but I am willing to sell you
a boat, since I have no use for them if the Siren remains here."

mobs.LongDesc: A woman stands here, bowing in your direction.
You see a knight here, dressed in red armor.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You look at a knight here.  He is dressed in red armor, and he looks very
strong.  Obviously, he must be one of the many adventurers trying to rescue
the baby prince that was captured by the Demon Lord.

mobs.LongDesc: You see a knight here, dressed in blue armor.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You look at a knight here.  He is dressed in blue armor, and looks very
experienced.  Obviously, he must be one of the many adventurers trying to
rescue the baby prince that was captured by the Demon Lord.

mobs.LongDesc: You see a knight here, dressed in white armor.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You look at a knight here.  He is dressed in white armor, and he looks very
competent.  Obviously, he must be one of the many adventurers trying to rescue
the baby prince that was captured by the Demon Lord.

mobs.LongDesc: You see a knight here, dressed in green armor.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You look at a knight here.  He is dressed in green armor, and he looks very
tough.  Obviously, he must be one of the many adventurers trying to rescue
the baby prince that was captured by the Demon Lord.

mobs.LongDesc: A bard stands here, singing songs of better days
mobs.DetailedDesc:
A bard stands here, singing to a crowd of villagers.  Noticing your arrival,
he changes his song to that of a legend that you've heard sung before...
"Seven companions once sought adventure,
One was a brave knight, willing to risk it all,
One was a wise priest, strong in his beliefs,
One was a powerful mage, worldly in her ways,
One was a cunning thief, quick to help her friends,
One was a holy warrior, fiercely faithful to her God,
One was a dark warrior, black in soul, but brilliant in battle,
One was a cavalier of nature, friend to all that lives,
The seven found death, and one sacrificed for the six,
The remaining ones mourned, and created a tribute to their friend,
A labor of love, a work of art, a memory to honor,
Mined, cleansed, forged, decorated, blessed, magicked...
The honor of the fallen friend defeated death,
and was entrusted to the keeping of nature,
As a token to life, to remember their lost friend."

mobs.LongDesc: You see an old man here, sitting in the sun.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You see an old man here, who is sitting in the sun, and enjoying the warm
weather.  He looks up at you and says, "Hi there, youngster, I bet you want
to hear a story.  Well, the only one that I know of is the one the bards
have been singing.  But you know what?  It's a true story.  The shopkeepers
in the town are the remaining six companions.  It's a shame that their friend
had to die though, it really broke their spirits.  And they locked away
the tribute to their friend in many different places, so that no one could
abuse its power, and they even locked it away from the people they gave it
to, and gave the key to one they knew wouldn't give the key away, or have the
key taken away from..."

mobs.LongDesc: A cyborg called Wren wanders about, being gawked by onlookers.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You have never seen such a man (or whatever it is) wander the streets of 
Japan (except for Godzilla ^_^) He is donned in black-plated armor that
looks impervious enough to withstand the force of a nuclear warhead. He
wields an enormous pulse cannon on one arm which looks like it could take
down a skyscraper with one hit. People stare in awe and fear at him
, surprised by his height and sheer strength. Tall and dark, his eyes shine
with an intense intelligence and calmness. His chistled features are framed
by a black head gear that comes in contrast with his pale skin. Looking
in you direction he asks, "Do you know the coordinates to the nearest space
station?

mobs.LongDesc: Parn, the warrior guildmaster stands here, judging your form.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You see the warrior guildmaster here.  His name is Parn, as you have heard 
his name whispered across the town.  He looks like a fierce warrior, and
yet, his eyes tell you of a more innocent time.  You have heard that he came
from an island known as Lodoss, and is only here temporarily.

mobs.LongDesc: Etoh, the cleric guildmaster stands here, teaching you how to be more spiritual.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You see the cleric guildmaster here.  His name is Etoh, as you have heard
his name whispered across the town.  He looks like a very wise cleric, and
yet, his eyes shine of keen knowledge as well.  You have heard that he is
a king in a distant land known as Lodoss, be he has been travelling with his
friends, and is only taking this position temporarily.

mobs.LongDesc: Slayn, the mage guildmaster stands here, correcting your spellcasting.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You see the mage guildmaster here.  His name is Slayn, as you have heard
his name whispered across the town.  He looks like a compentent magician,
and his eyes tell you that he his a good man.  You have heard that he comes
from an island known as Lodoss, and is here only as a temporary position,
before he goes onword with his journeys.

mobs.LongDesc: Woodchuck, the thief guildmaster stands here, backstabbing you with a spoon.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You see the thief guildmaster here.  His name is Woodchuck, and you have
heard his name whispered across the town.  He looks like a very sneaky 
individual, but the look in his eyes tell you he is a very loyal companion.
You have heard that he comes from an island known as Lodoss, and is here
with his friends only as a temporary stop off before their quest continues.

mobs.LongDesc: Ghim, the ranger guildmaster stands here, checking the direction of the wind.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You see the ranger guildmaster here.  His name is Ghim, and you have heard
his name whispered among the townspeople.  He is an old dwarf, but you can
see the wisdom in his eyes.  You have heard that he is just passing by the
town, and only filling this position temporarily, before he moves onword.
You have also heard of tales of his death, and wonder what he is doing here.

mobs.LongDesc: Deedlit, the paladin guildmaster stands here, giggling at your mistakes.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You see the paladin guildmaster here.  Her name is Deedlit, and you have heard
of her from the whispers of the townspeople.  She is an elf, and only here
temporarily.  While she is really no paladin, she knows of many clerical
spells, and her natural fighting ability makes her an obvious choice as a
guildmaster.  You have heard that she is only passing by, and will be moving
on shortly.

mobs.LongDesc: Pirotess, the anti-paladin guildmaster stands here, casting a spell.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You see the anti-paladin guildmaster here.  Her name is Pirotess, and you 
have heard stories about her from the villagers.  She is a dark-elf, from
the looks of it, and her knowledge of the dark magics and her fighting ablility
makes her an easy choice as guildmaster.  No one knows where she comes
from, and she will probably leave soon, but for now, she is the guildmaster
and is willing to teach you what you need to know.

mobs.LongDesc: The glutton's wife lays on the ground sensually, waiting to be harrassed.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Taken from Diva's house of pleasure, this woman makes the perfect mate for
the glutton of punishment. Wagging her tongue in your direction, she waits
to be punished as she runs her hands up and down her scantily clad body.

mobs.LongDesc: A glutton for punishment is here, chopping wood.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You see a very strange looking man.  He seems to look quite depressed and
has a very sad look on his face.  He looks at you with imploring eyes, and
asks you to punish him for his sins.  You wonder if you should do it, because
he looks like a very strong man, able to take a lot of punishment.
